99908.「…………。\n 俺……オリギ。行商人。\n<br>\n「俺の仕事……馬車で\n:

Beacon, Gilzad Region Cove Village. Do you want to take a wagon?

117314.「…………。\n ここから北……ザマ峠。\n そこに ザマ烽火台……ある。\n<:
......North of here... Is Zama Pass. And there... Is Zama Beacon...
North of Zama Pass... Landonfoot. And west of there... Gert Strait and the Bridge Inn.
From there to the southeast... The Gilzad Region. There... Is Cove Village.
Now... If you've never been, try going... It's good.

112690.墓石には 「踊り子ファラン ここに眠る」\nと刻まれている。: The tombstone is inscribed, ''Here lies Dancer Faran''.

112691.墓石には 「踊り子シャーラ ここに眠る」\nと刻まれている。: The tombstone is inscribed, ''Here lies Dancer Shara''.

112692.かなり古い墓石だ。\n名前が刻まれていたようだが\nかすれていて 読み取ることが:
It is a very old tombstone. It seems to have
had a name engraved on it, but it is too faint
to read.
